section.title: Creating Chargeback Rates
section.para: CloudForms Management Engine allows you to create your own set of computing and storage costs.

step.para: Click the [label]#Rates# accordion and select either Compute or Storage.

listitem.para: Use Compute to set chargeback rates for CPU, disk I/O, memory, network I/O, and fixed items.
Use Storage to set chargeback rates for fixed and storage items.

step.para:
Click
(Configuration),
(Add a new Chargeback Rate) to create a new chargeback rate.
Type in a Description for the chargeback rate.
For each item that you want to set, type in a rate and select a time option.
